name: Hybrid-IForest
paper: Hybrid isolation forest-application to intrusion detection
description: Hybrid Isolation Forest enhances the classic Isolation Forest by introducing two extensions: exploiting a distance knowledge to neighboring ’normal’ data, and infusing supervised learning capability.
bibtex: @misc{marteau2017hybridisolationforest,title={Hybrid Isolation Forest - Application to Intrusion Detection}, author={Pierre-François Marteau and Saeid Soheily-Khah and Nicolas Béchet},year={2017},eprint={1705.03800},archivePrefix={arXiv},primaryClass={cs.LG},}
